describe: Kiribati is a Pacific island nation composed of 33 atolls and reef islands, known for its stunning marine life, rich culture, and unique position straddling the equator and the International Date Line.

cities.name: 🏝 Tarawa
cities.geographical_location: Located in the central Pacific Ocean, Tarawa is the capital of Kiribati and is situated on an atoll.
cities.climate: Tarawa has a tropical rainforest climate with high humidity and temperatures averaging around 28°C (82°F) year-round.
cities.famous_cuisine: Te Bua Toro Ni Baukin (coconut crab) and fresh seafood dishes.

cities.name: 🏝 Kiritimati
cities.geographical_location: Kiritimati, also known as Christmas Island, is located in the northern Line Islands of Kiribati.
cities.climate: Kiritimati has a tropical desert climate with minimal rainfall and warm temperatures throughout the year.
cities.famous_cuisine: Ika Mata (raw fish salad) and coconut-based dishes.
